name: Fae Victus
description1: Pressure Cooker: Deal a 75, 3 turn Dot and gain a pip if enemy team has a minion [0 pips]
description2: Everything Can Burn: Deal a 200, 4 turn DoT and push a trap to enemy [1 pip]
description3: Creeping Flames: Deal 125 damage and place a 75 trap if you have a HoT [1 pip]
description4: S'more Heat: Deal a 300, 3 turn DoT and place a 125 trap if enemy has a trap [2 pips]
description5: Forgefire Burst: Deal 250 damage and clear trap on self for 1 pip [2 pips]
description6: Scourge Of The Forest: Deal 325 damage to all enemies and place a 125 trap if you have a HoT [5 pips]
description7: Wyvern Woe: Deal a 200, 4 turn DoT or expel minion to pacify self for 2 turns [1 pip]
description8: Firebird Wings: Clear enemy shield to detonate DoT then deal 75 damage [0 pips]
description9: Scorch The Earth: Deal a 300, 3 turn DoT to all enemies and clear a trap on whole team for 1 pip [4 pips]
description10: Strife After Death: Deal a 450, 3 turn DoT and place afterlife that deals a 375, 3 turn DoT to enemy team if enemy is a minion [3 pips]

name: Wintrix Flutterwing
description1: Chill Wind: Deal 50 damage and gain a pip if enemy has a DoT [0 pips]
description2: Placate: Pacify target for 2 turns [0 pips]
description3: Glacial Dampener: Place a 125 shield and a stun block [1 pip]
description4: Trap Beetle: Deal 150 damage and place a 125 trap if your team has a minion [2 pips]
description5: Permafrost Shield: Place a 375 shield and gift 1 pip [4 pips]
description6: Frozen Warrior: Deal 150 damage to all enemies and clear a trap from whole team for a 125 shield [5 pips]
description7: Winter's Blessing: Gift 3 pips and place a 125 shield if your team has a minion [3 pips]
description8: Ice Scream: Deal 50 damage and clear blade to stun enemy (Will hit twice if blade is present) [1 pip]
description9: Freeze And Thaw: Place a 125 shield and clear trap for 1 pip [1 pip]
description10: Brisk and Reward: Gift 2 pips and a 125 shield if team has a minion to whole team [4 pips]

name: Lyra Idylwing
description1: Mischievous Imp: Push a mantle then deal 75 damage [0 pips]
description2: Summon Thrall: Summon a minion or level up minion if you already have one [0 pips]
description3: Fabled Centaur: Deal 125 damage and place a 75 trap if enemy has a DoT [1 pip]
description4: Stoke The Ember: Place afterlife on minion that deals 125 damage to all enemies [1 pip]
description5: Ember Legends: Target minion to place a 200 trap on all enemies [3 pips]
description6: Bad Doggy: Clear mantle from team then deal 325 damage to all enemies [6 pips]
description7: Beneficence: Gift 2 pips and clear mantle for 1 pip to self [2 pips]
description8: Clangorous Banshee: Deal 75 damage and detonate DoT [0 pips]
description9: Bad Kitty: Deal 125 damage or 200 damage if enemy has taunt active [1 pip]
description10: Tremor: Deal 250 damage to all enemies and place a 125 trap if enemy has a DoT [4 pips]

name: Aria Greenthorn
description1: Seedling: Push a HoT and place a 100, 4 turn HoT on self [0 pips]
description3: Clever Imp: Deal 100 damage and clear enemy shield for a 100, 4 turn HoT on self [1 pip]
description4: Divine Intervention: Heal 200 HP and place a 100 blade if target has a blade [2 pips]
description5: Planestalker: Deal 225 damage and place an afterlife that gives enemy team a 100, 4 turn DoT if enemy is a minion [3 pips]
description6: Fiddleback: Deal 150 damage and a 200, 4 turn DoT to all enemies
description7: Spiteful Sprite: Place a 200, 4 turn HoT and a 50 blade [1 pip]
description8: Angelic Vigor: Deal 200 damage and gain a double pip, 3 turn bubble if you have a blade [3 pips]
description9: Revenant: Place afterlife that gives rest of team double pips [1 pip]
description10: Dryad Of Artemis: Heal 100 HP per pip [X pips]

name: Morticia Doomsprinkle
description2: Mischievous Spirit: Place a 125 trap and steal enemy blade [1 pip]
description3: Foul Nectar: Deal a 200, 4 turn DoT [1 pip]
description4: Horrid Homunculus: Deal a 300, 4 turn DoT and clear HoT to detonate [2 pips]
description5: Hasten Death: Take 75 damage then place a double pip, 4 turn bubble [3 pips]
description6: Grasping Ghost: Place a 125 trap on all enemies and steal a blade from each [4 pips]
description7: Infection: Place a -75 heal blade on enemy [0 pips]
description8: Cursed Kitty: Deal 125 damage and place a 75 trap if you have a blade [1 pip]
description10: Death's Champion: Deal a 300, 4 turn DoT to all enemies and place 125 traps if you have a blade [5 pips]

name: Sandy Glimmerwing
description1: Accelerate: Gift 1 pip and detonate a HoT [0 pips]
description2: Energize: Heal 50 HP and gift 1 pip [1 pip]
description3: Swindler: Deal 75 damage and swap HoT / DoT with enemy [1 pip]
description4: Shamanic Pact: Deal a 200, 4 turn DoT and get a 150, 3 turn HoT [2 pips]
description5: Innervation: Gift 3 pips and swap HoT / DoT [3 pips]
description7: Invigorate: Place a double pip, 5 turn bubble [4 pips]
description8: Provoke: Deal 50 damage and detonate a DoT [0 pips]
description9: Reconstruct: Place a 200, 4 turn HoT and clear a DoT for a 150, 3 turn HoT [2 pips]
description10: Power Conversion: Place a 4 turn bubble that gifts a pip for every spell cast on person that is ranked 3+ (costs 3 or more pips) [1 pip]
